#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
 
int main() 
{
	int t,test,flag;
	cin>>t;
	int i;
	string s1,s2;
	int hash1[26],hash2[26];
	for(test=0;test<t;test++)
	{
		cin>>s1>>s2;
		int l1 = s1.length();
		int l2 = s2.length();
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)hash1[i]=hash2[i]=0;
		
		for(i=0;i<l1;i++)hash1[s1[i]-65]++;
		for(i=0;i<l2;i++)hash2[s2[i]-65]++;
		
		flag = 1;
		
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
			if(hash1[i]!=hash2[i])
			{
				flag = 0;
				break;
			}
		}
		
		if(flag==0)
		{
			cout<<"NO\n";
		}
		else
		{
			cout<<"YES\n";
		}
		
	}
	
	return 0;
}
